title: OKAY, Can you FINALLY bring back Zephyr?
body:
just 
why
was
it
removed?

i don't think it's fair for lucian to be able to sell his boots because there are better {{item:3006}}  in late game, but that i can't as a bruiser sell my {{item:3111}}  because i need something against the billion of cc that the enemy team has.

either bring it back, or bring an item that gives non-stackable tenacity (even with mercury) that gives AD,hp,tenacity.
thank you

replies.body: Even if was only ever bought as a last item, Zephyr was worth having in the game

> [{quoted}](name=Anonagon,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=LslELWUY,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-10-12T19:10:06.172+0000)
>
> Even if was only ever bought as a last item, Zephyr was worth having in the game

I really liked it on Kha'zix and Hecarim. Made them faster, and it was fun being able to weave autos in easier.
{{champion:40}} : zehpyr was taken away?

''zephyr is just not used enough, {{item:3056}}  totally is though so we will keep that item in the game''

biggest slap in the face ever, say it's not used enough even though I saw zephyr about 10 times more then {{item:3056}}  and was building it in allot of games where as {{item:3056}}  is useless in every single case as opposed to zephyr
Thats still an item because its a tribute to someone that had over 1000 referrals
RIP Grez
yeah thats the only reason its still in the game
when you dive someone as a zed with a ohm its fun

{{item:2138}} {{item:3170}} 
You are Welcome.

Yours Truly,
~ Riot.

One of them is stackable Tenacity, thus doesn't count. 

The other one is:
A. An AP item
B. Not on SR
Well now you're just being picky. ;p
no hes being right plus {{item:3170}} is on TTL

Originally he just asked for tenacity.
Those have tenacity.

He's being very serious. I'm not.

are u idiot? i don't talk about 3v3, lucian can sell his boot to get an item that get ms and as, and i can't sell my boot because i need tenacity, and i need MOVEMENT SPEED.

the fuck do you want me to buy as {{champion:36}}{{champion:2}}  ?
http://vignette2.wikia.nocookie.net/leagueoflegends/images/7/7b/Swiftness_mastery_s4.png/revision/latest?cb=20131122000449

yeah but 1 you can only get on a certian map and the other goes away after what 3 mins if im not mistaken
the only item that gives you perminait tenacity was merc treds and Zephyr 

and ah ok
They should just revamp it to take away the AS and make it a HP or AD item, while keeping the MS. It's bs the fact that only ADC can have a optimal MS item.

Yes but change the stats.

35% Tenacity, 25 AD, 50% AS, 10% CDR, and 10% MS is a lot and an oddly unfair combo of MS and Tenacity. (Seriously you bring this back and I will buy it with PD and show you how much bullshit it is.)

Here's my idea: 35 AD, 50% AS, 10% CDR, 5% MS. Builds out of {{item:1037}} {{item:3101}}. You want tenacity? Get the boots. You're an ADC? Get QSS. You want to permakite Darius? Buy PD because that's busted for that reason.
We're asking for Zephyr specifically because of the Tenacity
It really wouldn't be Zephyr without at least 10% ms and 35% tenacity.

MS is a fun, yet tool for trolls. Dunkmaster yi existed because of movespeed. I used to stack Trinity forces on AD sion back when it had ad/ap/crit/as/ms. I could see AD/AS/MS be pretty fun to stack once you buy a single BoRK (Probuild: BoRK/Bloodrazor/Zephyr/Zephyr/Zephyr/Zephyr). Oh, and the CDR caps perfectly too XD
ADCs are the only champions in the game allowed by Riot to have a late game fantasy
Ohmwrecker, Righteous Glory and Athenes are all fucking dogshit and almost never purchased but y'know.

As a person who bought Athene's even when everybody was running double Morello...

http://pre02.deviantart.net/5581/th/pre/f/2012/354/a/5/known_memes_refreshed_by_me__feel_mans__by_zcoogerchannel-d5omvkd.png
I love athene's on mid morg. Free mr a infinite mana for w push Feelsbadman.
RIP Athene's.

I feel offended that you put Glory on the same level as Ohmwrecker.
Then again I DO seem to be the only person I see building it from time to time...

> [{quoted}](name=YouCanMilkThose,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=LslELWUY,comment-id=00090001,timestamp=2016-10-13T10:23:12.183+0000)
>
> I feel offended that you put Glory on the same level as Ohmwrecker.
> Then again I DO seem to be the only person I see building it from time to time...

I build it religiously as naut, and some others.

back in season 5 when i was doing {{champion:102}} jungle with chinderhult that item was godly  after blade ruin king of course hell when i told my friends about old glory their win rates rose cause the item the ablity to give your team a mini sivir ult and slow bitchs it was one of the best tank items at the time (and yes i know i couldnt use the mana portion of it)
I agree, its active is pretty useful. Love using it on naut and run into the middle of a team fight using it, and dual slow everyone, and also have rylais ðŸ˜‚ðŸ˜‚ðŸ˜‚
well I mean since they nerfed it its just not worth it.

What if... Tier 2 boots became something you could buy 2 of?

In other words merc and Ninja or Mobility and swiftness.

Have base boots reduced to 20 from 25 movement speed and most tier 2 reduced to 15 for each outside of swiftness which increases it by 25 and mobility which is 90 out of combat and 0 in combat.

This would mean boosts of speed (20) + merc treads (15) + ninja Tabi (15) = 50 movemetn speed.

???

People don't even like having to keep one pair of boots late game and you want two?
Might this be more a reason to make boots offer more for the slot without drastically buffing the speed when completed?
totally forgot this item

beucause that item increased udyrs win rate to %61 at diamond elo. Ä°tem iteself had %79 win rate on udyr. Zephyr was waaaay too op on udyr than anybody else. You can rush it, you can build it in the middle, you could get it if you are behind/even/fed. So op. Then irelia and jax. I guess these 3 forced riot to remove it.
What a coincidence, the three abusers are all champions with extremely outdated kits that are little more than walking balls of stats.

I really dont understand your comment.

The 3 abusers are those who A) can be kited and want MS and Tenacity, B) want AS since they are autoattack based, and C) can make +25 AD go a long way. Zephyr will never be a 2nd or 3rd item for ADCs since it doesnt give any crit (or flat-pen, which current ADCs are liking/abusing). It will only be a late-game 6th item, and only if you dont want another zeal item. The only champions that really want the Zephyr as a core part of their kit are those with a similar playstyle to Irelia, Jax, or Udyr  - so champions like Shyvana, Trundle and Olaf. Champions with damage in their kits so they can make 25 AD go a long way, can be kited, and mostly use mostly autoattacks for their damage. 

And whats all this talk about "outdated kits"? From my experience, whenever Riot updates an "outdated" kit (aside from a rework, in which case their kit and playstyle is new), they usually make the champion much more stronger. Malz, Annie, Swain, Maokai, Brand, Zyra, Ashe, Fiddle and Garen had their kits updated, and all saw a spike in power while being more effective at doing the exact same thing. The only champions that I can remember that got their kits updated but turned them weaker were Anivia and Rengar.
i sometimes built it on nautilus
I cri evritime {{item:3070}}  {{champion:32}}  {{item:3070}}
I really like Cloak and Dagger on my AD Jungle Eve...
i miss this item so much
